43 // Struct NarrowPhaseInfoBatch
48 struct NarrowPhaseInfoBatch {
49 
50  struct NarrowPhaseInfo {
51 
53  uint64 overlappingPairId;
54 
56  Entity colliderEntity1;
57 
59  Entity colliderEntity2;
60 
62  LastFrameCollisionInfo* lastFrameCollisionInfo;
63 
65  MemoryAllocator* collisionShapeAllocator;
66 
68  Transform shape1ToWorldTransform;
69 
71  Transform shape2ToWorldTransform;
72 
74  CollisionShape* collisionShape1;
75 
77  CollisionShape* collisionShape2;
78 
80  bool reportContacts;
81 
83  bool isColliding;
84 
86  uint8 nbContactPoints;
87 
89  ContactPointInfo contactPoints[NB_MAX_CONTACT_POINTS_IN_NARROWPHASE_INFO];
90 
92  NarrowPhaseInfo(uint64 pairId, Entity collider1, Entity collider2, LastFrameCollisionInfo* lastFrameInfo, MemoryAllocator& shapeAllocator,
93  const Transform& shape1ToWorldTransform, const Transform& shape2ToWorldTransform, CollisionShape* shape1,
94  CollisionShape* shape2, bool needToReportContacts)
95  : overlappingPairId(pairId), colliderEntity1(collider1), colliderEntity2(collider2), lastFrameCollisionInfo(lastFrameInfo),
96  collisionShapeAllocator(&shapeAllocator), shape1ToWorldTransform(shape1ToWorldTransform),
97  shape2ToWorldTransform(shape2ToWorldTransform), collisionShape1(shape1),
98  collisionShape2(shape2), reportContacts(needToReportContacts), isColliding(false), nbContactPoints(0) {
99 
100  }
101  };
102 
103  protected:
104 
106  MemoryAllocator& mMemoryAllocator;
107 
109  OverlappingPairs& mOverlappingPairs;
110 
112  uint32 mCachedCapacity = 0;
113 
114  public:
115 
117  Array<NarrowPhaseInfo> narrowPhaseInfos;
118 
120  NarrowPhaseInfoBatch(OverlappingPairs& overlappingPairs, MemoryAllocator& allocator);
121 
123  ~NarrowPhaseInfoBatch();
124 
126  void addNarrowPhaseInfo(uint64 pairId, Entity collider1, Entity collider2, CollisionShape* shape1,
127  CollisionShape* shape2, const Transform& shape1Transform, const Transform& shape2Transform,
128  bool needToReportContacts, LastFrameCollisionInfo* lastFrameInfo, MemoryAllocator& shapeAllocator);
129 
131  uint32 getNbObjects() const;
132 
134  void addContactPoint(uint32 index, const Vector3& contactNormal, decimal penDepth,
135  const Vector3& localPt1, const Vector3& localPt2);
136 
138  void resetContactPoints(uint32 index);
139 
140  // Initialize the containers using cached capacity
141  void reserveMemory();
142 
144  void clear();
145 };
146 
148 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 NarrowPhaseInfoBatch::getNbObjects() const {
149  return static_cast<uint32>(narrowPhaseInfos.size());
150 }
151 
152 // Add shapes to be tested during narrow-phase collision detection into the batch
153 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void NarrowPhaseInfoBatch::addNarrowPhaseInfo(uint64 pairId, Entity collider1, Entity collider2, CollisionShape* shape1,
154  CollisionShape* shape2, const Transform& shape1Transform, const Transform& shape2Transform,
155  bool needToReportContacts, LastFrameCollisionInfo* lastFrameInfo, MemoryAllocator& shapeAllocator) {
156 
157  // Create a meta data object
158  narrowPhaseInfos.emplace(pairId, collider1, collider2, lastFrameInfo, shapeAllocator, shape1Transform, shape2Transform, shape1, shape2, needToReportContacts);
159 }
160 
161 // Add a new contact point
162 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void NarrowPhaseInfoBatch::addContactPoint(uint32 index, const Vector3& contactNormal, decimal penDepth, const Vector3& localPt1, const Vector3& localPt2) {
163 
164  assert(penDepth > decimal(0.0));
165 
166  if (narrowPhaseInfos[index].nbContactPoints < NB_MAX_CONTACT_POINTS_IN_NARROWPHASE_INFO) {
167 
168  assert(contactNormal.length() > 0.8f);
169 
170  // Add it into the array of contact points
171  narrowPhaseInfos[index].contactPoints[narrowPhaseInfos[index].nbContactPoints].normal = contactNormal;
172  narrowPhaseInfos[index].contactPoints[narrowPhaseInfos[index].nbContactPoints].penetrationDepth = penDepth;
173  narrowPhaseInfos[index].contactPoints[narrowPhaseInfos[index].nbContactPoints].localPoint1 = localPt1;
174  narrowPhaseInfos[index].contactPoints[narrowPhaseInfos[index].nbContactPoints].localPoint2 = localPt2;
175  narrowPhaseInfos[index].nbContactPoints++;
176  }
177 }
178 
179 // Reset the remaining contact points
180 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void NarrowPhaseInfoBatch::resetContactPoints(uint32 index) {
181  narrowPhaseInfos[index].nbContactPoints = 0;
182 }
183 
184 }
185 
186 #endif
